glossary.definition: Search Engine Optimization - the practice of improving website visibility in search engine results.
Search Engine Results Page - the page displayed by a search engine in response to a query.
A link from one website to another, important for SEO authority.
A word or phrase that describes the content of a webpage and is used by search engines for indexing.
A brief summary of a webpage's content that appears in search results.
Alternative text description of an image, used for accessibility and SEO.
The preferred version of a webpage when there are duplicate or similar content pages.
A search engine ranking score that predicts how likely a website is to rank on search engine result pages.

chatbots.title: ChatGPT
chatbots.description: AI assistant that can help with content creation, SEO strategy, and code generation.

chatbots.title: Claude
chatbots.description: AI assistant helpful for analyzing content and generating SEO recommendations.

chatbots.description: Microsoft's AI-powered search chatbot for answering SEO questions.
